content: I opened a topic for this in the wg-mir-opt stream, and as Ralf pointed out, it should've probably been here. I don't know if it can be moved here, but if anyone wants to chip in, here it is: https://rust-lang.zulipchat.com/#narrow/stream/189540-t-compiler.2Fwg-mir-opt/topic/Proofs.20of.20soundness :3
An adminstrator can move topics between streams. @pnkfelix?
